name: df-cj
body: |- wceq(ccj, cmpt(s0, cc, crio(s1, cc, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), cr)))))
comment: Define the complex conjugate function. See ~ cjcli for its closure and ~ cjval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Nov-2013.)
